name: GOAL_OUTCOME_CNCT
description: This table contains care plan goal records that have goal outcome documentation for a particular encounter.

columns.name: GOAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the goal record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CP_IGO_OC_EPTCSN_N
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for the encounter where the care plan goal outcome was documented. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: IP_CP_GOAL_OC_DAT
columns.description: The contact date (DAT) for the encounter where the care plan goal outcome was documented.

columns.name: VISIT_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Links to the note (HNO) record that stores the Home Health and Hospice goal visit note.
